content.raw:
Did we change something on CI for this to work? The `ign-rendering2` branch is now failing on Windows:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_rendering-ign-2-win/26/console

```
[45.735s] C:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_rendering-ign-2-win\ws\ign-rendering\ogre\src\OgreRTShaderSystem.cc(300,37): error C2660: 'Ogre::RTShader::ShaderGenerator::removeShaderBasedTechnique': function does not take 4 arguments [C:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_rendering-ign-2-win\ws\build\ignition-rendering2\ogre\src\ignition-rendering2-ogre.vcxproj]
```

CC @{557058:684383ab-ac95-4859-a350-4a6f41a94a22}
